title: Womens Dress Sleeveless
title_original: Unidear Womens Buffalo Plaid Vest Casual Lapel Open Front Sleeveless Cardigan Jacket Coat with Pockets

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the vest's style appealing, with one noting it looks like a more expensive item, and appreciate its slimming fit and beautiful construction.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortably casual and cozy
items.body: So darn cute! So many compliments! Material weight is perfect (not to heavy but not thin!) I’m a short person so I loved that the length was just right because usually everything is too long. The color was nice and bright - and didn’t fade when washed! I will definitely be buying more colors! Read more
items.author: J. Jegen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute!
items.body: This is very cute and I got so many compliments at the Christmas party. It’s not as long as the pictures show, but I still really like it. The quality is nice and it’s not too heavy. Read more
items.author: MFL2

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute but not as pictured
items.body: This winter vest is super cute and the red/brown is true color as pictured. The flannel material is soft and not itchy, the collar portion is a different material that lays behind your neck not scracthy though. I bought the !large and it fits to cover my chest/,stomach area. However a bit disappointed because it's much shorter than the modeled photo. I thought it would be longer to wear with leggings. Also, because its shorter the pockets are a bit awkward to use. Even though I still love it and will wear with a long sleeve brown shirt, jeans and tall brown boots. I'll update review with photo when I wear. Read more
items.author: Daleen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice addition to fall wardrobe!
items.body: I am 5’3” 185lbs, broad shoulders and hold my weight in my stomach. This vest is soft and the XL fits great. Vest sits at widest part of my hip and the lines in the vest create a nice illusion of a waist for this menopausal mom. Colors are nice and true. One thing is the front “collar” that folds out is the material that is in the inside, which I thought was odd at first, but it blends well. The vest is warm. Can’t wait for cooler temps to wear! Read more
items.author: Kim Jolicoeur

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but undecided
items.body: I bought this vest in two sizes: XL and XXL - I usually wear a 14/XL. Both fit fine and the XL might even be a touch too big. The pockets are nice, but cause the vest to not lay flat on the hip (for me anyway). Also, the flowy lapels seem SO big I feel like I might as well be wearing a shawl across my shoulders. I tried cinching it with a belt and the effect was slightly better, but still didn't win me over. I want to love this vest - the fabric is nice and soft and the pattern is cute for Fall, but I'm just not sure it's for me. Read more
items.author: Stacy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute vest
items.body: Super cute! I love this vest for fall time! And the pockets are great too! Read more
items.author: Jennifer Everett

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Pretty but hole in pocket
items.body: Pretty but pocket has hole I will need to sew disappointed Read more
items.author: Y. Belnap

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits great
items.body: The quality was better than expected Read more
items.author: Tim'swife19

short_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Dress Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: #1z-navy, #1-white and Black, #23-light Red, #23-wine Red, #23-pink, #1z-coffee, #2-light Red, #23-orange Navy, #23-orange, #2-blue and Red, #3-red and Black, #1-red, #1-wine Red, #2-grey and White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
